Name: Whiskey Collins
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda water and briefly stir.
Review: A whiskey-based twist on the classic Tom Collins .
Nutrition: One serving of Whiskey Collins contains 201 calories
